query: UPDATE stamp_activity SET name = COALESCE(?1, name), display_name = COALESCE(?2, display_name), stamps_required = COALESCE(?3, stamps_required), reward_quantity = COALESCE(?4, reward_quantity), reward_strategy = COALESCE(?5, reward_strategy), designated_product_id = COALESCE(?6, designated_product_id), is_cyclic = COALESCE(?7, is_cyclic), is_active = COALESCE(?8, is_active), updated_at = ?9 WHERE id = ?10
